level.heading: NEEDS COVERED BY DIVERSION PAYMENTS (ยง 29-5833)

level.text: Diversion payments are available to pay an immediate, short term financial need, which if resolved, will allow the applicant to continue or accept employment.
An immediate, short-term financial need for which an applicant may receive a Diversion Payment (up to the maximum amount) includes, but is not limited to:
Repair of a motor vehicle, but not including routine maintenance such as oil change, windshield wiper blades, air conditioner repair, etc.;
Rent, mortgage payments, security deposit and utility arrearage(s), but not utilities alone;
Work clothes such as uniform, special shoes, etc.;
